00039 MasterClient::MasterClient(ConnectionManagerPtr &connManagerPtr, Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspacePtr, time_t timeout, ApplicationQueuePtr &appQueuePtr) : m_verbose(true), m_conn_manager_ptr(connManagerPtr), m_hyperspace_ptr(hyperspacePtr), m_app_queue_ptr(appQueuePtr), m_timeout(timeout), m_initiated(false) {
00040   int error;
00041 
00042   m_comm = m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm();
00043   memset(&m_master_addr, 0, sizeof(m_master_addr));
00044 
00048   m_master_file_callback_ptr = new MasterFileHandler(this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00049   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/master", OPEN_FLAG_READ, m_master_file_callback_ptr, &m_master_file_handle)) != Error::OK) {
00050     if (error != Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_NOT_FOUND && error != Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME) {
00051       HT_ERRORF("Unable to open Hyperspace file '/hypertable/master' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00052       exit(1);
00053     }
00054     m_master_file_handle = 0;
00055   }
00056 }

00060 MasterClient::~MasterClient() {
00061   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(m_master_file_handle);
00062 }

00069 int MasterClient::initiate_connection(DispatchHandlerPtr dispatchHandlerPtr) {
00070   m_dispatcher_handler_ptr = dispatchHandlerPtr;
00071   if (m_master_file_handle == 0)
00072     return Error::MASTER_NOT_RUNNING;
00073   return reload_master();
00074 }

00078 int MasterClient::create_table(const char *tableName, const char *schemaString, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00079   CommBufPtr cbufPtr( MasterProtocol::create_create_table_request(tableName, schemaString) );
00080   return send_message(cbufPtr, handler);
00081 }

00083 
00084 
00085 int MasterClient::create_table(const char *tableName, const char *schemaString) {
00086   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00087   EventPtr eventPtr;
00088   CommBufPtr cbufPtr( MasterProtocol::create_create_table_request(tableName, schemaString) );
00089   int error = send_message(cbufPtr, &syncHandler);
00090   if (error == Error::OK) {
00091     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr)) {
00092       if (m_verbose)
00093         HT_ERRORF("Master 'create table' error, tableName=%s : %s", tableName, MasterProtocol::string_format_message(eventPtr).c_str());
00094       error = (int)MasterProtocol::response_code(eventPtr);
00095     }
00096   }
00097   return error;
00098 }

00106 
00107 int MasterClient::get_schema(const char *tableName, std::string &schema) {
00108   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00109   EventPtr eventPtr;
00110   CommBufPtr cbufPtr( MasterProtocol::create_get_schema_request(tableName) );
00111   int error = send_message(cbufPtr, &syncHandler);
00112   if (error == Error::OK) {
00113     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr)) {
00114       if (m_verbose)
00115         HT_ERRORF("Master 'get schema' error, tableName=%s : %s", tableName, MasterProtocol::string_format_message(eventPtr).c_str());
00116       error = (int)MasterProtocol::response_code(eventPtr);
00117     }
00118     else {
00119       uint8_t *ptr = eventPtr->message + sizeof(int32_t);
00120       size_t remaining = eventPtr->messageLen - sizeof(int32_t);
00121       const char *schemaStr;
00122       if (!Serialization::decode_string(&ptr, &remaining, &schemaStr)) {
00123         if (m_verbose)
00124           HT_ERRORF("Problem decoding response to 'get schema' command for table '%s'", tableName);
00125         return Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR;
00126       }
00127       schema = schemaStr;
00128     }
00129   }
00130   return error;
00131 }

00134 int MasterClient::status() {

00136   EventPtr eventPtr;

00141       if (m_verbose)
00142         HT_ERRORF("Master 'status' error : %s", MasterProtocol::string_format_message(eventPtr).c_str());
00143       error = (int)MasterProtocol::response_code(eventPtr);
00144     }
00145   }
00146   return error;
00147 }

00218 
00219 int MasterClient::send_message(CommBufPtr &cbufPtr, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00220   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00221   int error;
00222 
00223   if ((error = m_comm->send_request(m_master_addr, m_timeout, cbufPtr, handler)) != Error::OK) {
00224     std::string addrStr;
00225     if (m_verbose)
00226       HT_WARNF("Comm::send_request to %s failed - %s", InetAddr::string_format(addrStr, m_master_addr), Error::get_text(error));
00227   }
00228 
00229   return error;
00230 }

00236 int MasterClient::reload_master() {
00237   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00238   int error;
00239   DynamicBuffer value(0);
00240   std::string addrStr;
00241 
00242   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(m_master_file_handle, "address", value)) != Error::OK) {
00243     if (m_verbose)
00244       HT_ERRORF("Problem reading 'address' attribute of Hyperspace file /hypertable/master - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00245     return Error::MASTER_NOT_RUNNING;
00246   }
00247 
00248   addrStr = (const char *)value.base;
00249 
00250   if (addrStr != m_master_addr_string) {
00251 
00252     if (m_master_addr.sin_port != 0) {
00253       if ((error = m_conn_manager_ptr->remove(m_master_addr)) != Error::OK) {
00254         if (m_verbose)
00255           HT_WARNF("Problem removing connection to Master - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00256       }
00257       if (m_verbose)
00258         HT_INFOF("Connecting to new Master (old=%s, new=%s)", m_master_addr_string.c_str(), addrStr.c_str());
00259     }
00260 
00261     m_master_addr_string = addrStr;
00262 
00263     InetAddr::initialize(&m_master_addr, m_master_addr_string.c_str());
00264 
00265     m_conn_manager_ptr->add(m_master_addr, 15, "Master", m_dispatcher_handler_ptr);
00266   }
00267 
00268   return Error::OK;
00269 }

00271 
00272 bool MasterClient::wait_for_connection(long maxWaitSecs) {
00273   return m_conn_manager_ptr->wait_for_connection(m_master_addr, maxWaitSecs);
00274 }
